question: I have a head and a tail but no body.
Remove my skin and I won’t cry but you surely will.
What would you find in the middle of Toronto?
What kind of room has no walls doors or windows?
What runs but never walks has a mouth but never talks?
What word is always pronounced wrong?
I am a word of three letters Add two letters and there will be fewer What word am I?
I have keys but no locks space but no room You can enter but you can’t go outside.
Mary has four daughters and each of her daughters has a brother How many children does Mary have?
What has cities but no houses rivers but no water and roads but no traffic?
You’ll find me in Mercury Earth Mars Jupiter Saturn and Uranus but never in Neptune or Venus What am I?
What kind of tree can you carry in your hand?
People buy me to eat but never eat me.
I can travel around the world while staying in a corner.
What gets wetter as it dries?

Which number has the same number of letters as its value?
What has many teeth but cannot bite?
Born from an egg moving without legs with a strong backbone and a sizzling hiss what creature am I?
What are two things you can never eat for breakfast?
